org.apache.flink.api.common.functions

接口 CoGroupFunction<IN1,IN2,O>

  • 类型参数:
    IN1 - The data type of the first input data set.
    IN2 - The data type of the second input data set.
    O - The data type of the returned elements.
    所有超级接口:
    Function, java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    Graph.ApplyCoGroupFunction, Graph.ApplyCoGroupFunctionOnAllEdges, Graph.ApplyCoGroupFunctionOnAllNeighbors, Graph.ApplyCoGroupToEdgeValues, Graph.ApplyCoGroupToEdgeValuesOnEitherSourceOrTarget, Graph.ApplyCoGroupToVertexValues, Graph.ApplyNeighborCoGroupFunction, Graph.CountNeighborsCoGroup, Graph.EdgeRemovalCoGroup, Graph.MatchingEdgeReducer, Graph.VerticesRemovalCoGroup, Graph.VerticesUnionCoGroup, HITS.Authority, HITS.Hubbiness, InvalidVertexIdsValidator.GroupInvalidIds, JoinedStreams.FlatJoinCoGroupFunction, JoinedStreams.JoinCoGroupFunction, MusicProfiles.FilterOutMismatches, PageRank.SendScore, PlanBothUnwrappingCoGroupOperator.TupleBothUnwrappingCoGrouper, PlanLeftUnwrappingCoGroupOperator.TupleLeftUnwrappingCoGrouper, PlanRightUnwrappingCoGroupOperator.TupleRightUnwrappingCoGrouper, PythonCoGroup, RichCoGroupFunction, ScatterGatherIteration.GatherUdf, ScatterGatherIteration.GatherUdfSimpleVV, ScatterGatherIteration.GatherUdfVVWithDegrees, ScatterGatherIteration.ScatterUdfWithEdgeValues, ScatterGatherIteration.ScatterUdfWithEVsSimpleVV, ScatterGatherIteration.ScatterUdfWithEVsVVWithDegrees, VertexCentricIteration.VertexComputeUdf, WebLogAnalysis.AntiJoinVisits

    @Public
public interface CoGroupFunction<IN1,IN2,O>
extends Function, java.io.Serializable
    The interface for CoGroup functions. CoGroup functions combine two data sets by first grouping each data set after a key and then "joining" the groups by calling this function with the two sets for each key. If a key is present in only one of the two inputs, it may be that one of the groups is empty.

    The basic syntax for using CoGoup on two data sets is as follows: 

    
 DataSet<X> set1 = ...;
 DataSet<Y> set2 = ...;
 
 set1.coGroup(set2).where(<key-definition>).equalTo(<key-definition>).with(new MyCoGroupFunction());

    set1 is here considered the first input, set2 the second input.

    Some keys may only be contained in one of the two original data sets. In that case, the CoGroup function is invoked with in empty input for the side of the data set that did not contain elements with that specific key.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void coGroup(java.lang.Iterable<IN1> first, java.lang.Iterable<IN2> second, Collector<O> out)
      This method must be implemented to provide a user implementation of a coGroup.

    • 方法详细资料

      • coGroup

        void coGroup(java.lang.Iterable<IN1> first,
             java.lang.Iterable<IN2> second,
             Collector<O> out)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        This method must be implemented to provide a user implementation of a coGroup. It is called for each pair of element groups where the elements share the same key.
        参数:
        first - The records from the first input.
        second - The records from the second.
        out - A collector to return elements.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The function may throw Exceptions, which will cause the program to cancel, and may trigger the recovery logic.
